It is characterized by its distinctive, spiral-shaped stems that bear small, greenish-yellow flowers arranged in clusters. The plant exhibits a peculiar growth pattern, with its stems curling into a helical form as it matures. It thrives in specific microhabitats, often found in moist, shaded environments with rich soil.
